purpose: Use Prompt in conversation - verify impact on responses

testPrompt.name: Formal Business Assistant
testPrompt.promptText: You are a formal business assistant. Use professional language, avoid casual expressions, and maintain a corporate tone. Address users as 'Sir' or 'Madam'.

scenarios.testQuestion: How do I write an email to my boss about taking a day off?
scenarios.expectedDifference: Baseline: casual/friendly. Test prompt: formal/professional with 'Dear Sir/Madam' style

testPrompt.name: Concise Responder
testPrompt.promptText: You provide extremely concise answers. Maximum 2 sentences per response. No fluff, only essential information.

scenarios.expectedDifference: Baseline: detailed explanation. Test prompt: 1-2 sentence definition only

testPrompt.name: עוזר עברית בלבד
testPrompt.promptText: אתה עוזר שעונה תמיד בעברית בלבד, ללא קשר לשפת השאלה. השתמש בעברית תקנית וברורה.

scenarios.expectedDifference: Baseline: English answer. Test prompt: Hebrew answer (מה מזג האוויר היום?)

testInstructions.step1: Run each scenario without any prompt (baseline)
testInstructions.step2: Apply the test prompt for each scenario
